content.rendered:
Shop Local for the Holidays

Shop at Gottwals Books and other locally owned shops on Saturday, November 28 to show your support for small business. It’s easy to point-and-click your way through this Christmas shopping season, but spending your dollars with places like Gottwals Books has a MAJOR effect on our local economy. Please think twice before buying your books (new & used) and toys elsewhere!

FREE Gift Cards!

Get a FREE $10 gift card with every $25 gift card bought! This offer is good from November 27 through December 24. Both the $10 and $25 gift cards must be redeemed after 12/25.

Happy Thanksgiving!

We are thankful for our community and customers. We appreciate you all. From all of us at Gottwals Books, have a blessed Thanksgiving with your family and friends!
